headline.main: A COUP FOR WILLKIE; Minority Senators Offer Bill to Kill Outright All of Ship Law

lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Oct. 20 -- In a sudden move, highly disconcerting to the leadership of both major parties in Congress, three Republican Senators -- Bridges of New Hampshire, Austin of Vermont and Gurney of South Dakota -- today introduced an amendment to the House-approved armed ship resolution calling for outright repeal of the entire Neutrality Act of 1939 amending the law of 1937.
abstract: amendment to repeal Neutrality Act sees barring U S ships from belligerent ports and war zones offered by Dem Sens Lee, Green and Pepper, Sen
